message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the design of optimal precoding and power allocation policies for a MIMO link with multiple data streams and heterogeneous packet arrivals and delay requirements. This involves the use of Markov Decision Process (MDP) and channel state information (CSI) as well as queue state information (QSI). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.IT (Information Theory), which deals with the study of communication systems and their limits. Other likely sub-categories include cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
